room_title: Escape room "Mission: Sigma VR" by Battlefield Houston in Houston
room_address: 11755 W Little York Rd #202 Houston, TX 77041
room_description:
The Secret Service has neutralized a known terrorist who had been hiding out in a deprived area of the city. He acquired a nuclear warhead and was ready to use it when he was captured.  On the roof of an abandoned high-rise, the maniac has set the nuclear warhead and the timer is counting down.  The entire abandoned building has been turned into a tower filled with traps and obstacles.

We can get your team to the building's courtyard, but the rest will be riding on you.  Can you outwit the terrorist and save us from the nuclear explosion.
